variables.name: Your Question
variables.value: How would you approach this challenge?

session.title: 1-2-4-All (Variable + Miro)
session.description: Engage Everyone Simultaneously in Generating Questions, Ideas, and Suggestions.

0.name: $question
0.description: It's just you here. Think for yourself and take notes.

1.name: $question
1.description: Generate ideas in pairs building on ideas from self reflection.

prompts.message: Try to split time fairly. What similarities and differences do you notice?

2.name: $question
2.description: Share and develop ideas from your pair in foursomes. Notice similarities and differences.

3.name: Share
3.description: Each group shares one important idea with all.
